Fl_Device Class Reference

A pure virtual class subclassed to send graphics output to display, local files, or printers. More...

#include <Fl_Device.H>

Inherited by Fl_Display, Fl_Printer, and Fl_PSfile_Device.

Public Member Functions

int type ()
 An RTTI emulation of device classes. It returns values < 256 if it is a screen device.
virtual Fl_Device * set_current ()
 Sets this device (display, local file, printer) as the target of future graphics calls.

Detailed Description

A pure virtual class subclassed to send graphics output to display, local files, or printers.

Member Function Documentation

virtual Fl_Device* Fl_Device::set_current (  )  [virtual]

Sets this device (display, local file, printer) as the target of future graphics calls.

Returns:
The current target device of graphics calls.
